issue.title: [R] install_arrow() should conda install if appropriate
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7919](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7919). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Like, check `if (grepl("conda", R.Version()$platform))` and if so then `system("conda install ...")`. Error if nightly == TRUE because we don't host conda nightlies yet.

This would help with issues like https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/6448
